upgrades.name: GrandmaSpritzer
upgrades.description: Applies a highlight to Grandma so she can be seen through obstacles and other characters.

upgrades.name: SecurityGuard
upgrades.description: Creates Security Guards who will wander the mall and highlight nearby Villains for a time.

upgrades.name: RooftopSniper
upgrades.description: Creates a Rooftop Sniper who will periodically remove a random Villain from the mall.

upgrades.name: LocalWrestler
upgrades.description: Periodically releases a Local Wrestler into the mall who will find and remove the nearest Villain from the mall.

upgrades.name: BiggerMall
upgrades.description: Unlocks larger malls with more enemies and larger rewards.

upgrades.name: RocketPoweredScooter
upgrades.description: Provides Grandma with an incrementally larger speed boost.
